channel.name: RTSH Sport AL
channel.title: Roland Garros 2017
channel.desc: The French Open, also known as Roland-Garros, is a major tennis tournament held over two weeks at the Stade Roland Garros in Paris, France, beginning in late May each year. The tournament and venue are named after the French aviator Roland Garros.[(96057)]
